features: Perfectly compatible with the Newbealer Steam Mops (model NB603C and NB602N), this set of 6 replacement steam mop pads is an essential for hassle-free cleaning. Simply attach the pads onto the floor tool and let them do the work for you

These machine-washable steam mop replacement pads are designed to be durable and reusable, making them a cost-effective choice for your daily house cleaning routine. They can be tumble dried or line dried for your convenience

The triple-layer microfiber mop pads are made of high-quality materials that ensure effective cleaning, strong water absorption, and quick drying without fading even at high temperatures. The sandwich mesh lining allows steam to be easily released, resulting in a more efficient cleaning process.

These multipurpose steamer pads are suitable for use on a variety of flooring types, including sealed hardwood, marble, laminate, tile, and ceramic. Get your hands on these replacement pads and make cleaning a breeze!

Dimension of each pad 11.8*5.5*0.2 inches. Package includes: 6 x microfiber replacement pads. We offer a 1-year warranty with professional, friendly customer support to ensure a hassle-free experience.

Kindly Notes: Only fit for Steam Mop NB603C and NB602N These pads are compatible with Newbealer steam mops (model NB603C & NB602N). Dimensions of each pad: 11.8*5.5*0.2 inch.Great to have some pads on hand, convenient to replace as routine maintenance.

Features: Soft Microfiber Mop Pad High-quality Microfiber material is gentle on floors, yet effective at removing dirt and grime. Superior water absorption and resistance to fading in high temperatures make them perfect for tough messes.Sandwich mesh lining allows for easy steam release, resulting in a smooth cleaning experience.

Resuable and Efficient Textured microfiber pads are washable and reusable, providing increased scrubbing power and absorption for a more thorough cleaning experience.Maintain a clean home by regularly changing out Replacement Pads for your Newbealer steam mop - we suggest replacing the pads every 2-3 months depending on usage.

Easy to Install Lay the microfiber pad on a flat surface with the two fastener strips facing upAlign the mop head directly over the microfiber pad.The fastener strips will adhere to the pad grips on the bottom of the mop head.
Clean Multiple Surfaces with Ease: Our Mop Pads Meet All Your Needs
